title: How Big is Too Big For an Open World? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.19.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about the new report that Assassin's Creed Valhalla is actually BIGGER than previous games.  
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:03:00 - Housekeeping
REMEMBER: We’re doing a Core Game Jam - kindafunny.com/gamejam - $100 gets donated to Extra Life for every game submitted. To enter, publish a new game on the Core platform in one of four categories: party game, (kinda) funniest game, retro game, and pop-culture inspired game. There’s $5k in prizes, head to kindafunny.com/gamejam
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:05:41 - Assassin's Creed Valhalla will actually be bigger than Odyssey - Lauren Morton @ RockPaperShotgun
00:25:20 - Last of Us Part 2 Special Edition PS4 has been revealed - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:29:30 - Is Sony banking on the interest of people who still don't own a PS4? - Best Friends Q:Ricky Mcflyy
00:32:08 - We now know even more about Ghost of Tsushima
00:38:48 - PlayStation Now reaches 2.2m subscribers - Matthew Handrahan @ GiBIZ
00:44:55 - Out today
00:49:30 - Reader mail   -
00:52:01 - Sony says that the PS5 lineup will be revealed “soon”. What do you guys think they’ll announce first? - Weissmark
00:58:52 - Are there any games you’d like to see the script for? - MaDogNik96 (from Massachusetts)
01:01:50 - Squad Up:Jack Martin(PSN) - FascinatedJack
01:02:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
